Battle Special Tables
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): FAQ: The Most Important Game Data: Battle Special Tables
By Dark Phoenix on Monday, July 30, 2001 - 09:13 pm:

I gathered this data from a table from a Japanese site. This shows the effects and triggering conditions of the various battle specials. This is reprinted without the permission of the source site. In any case, I'll give full credit to the following site for this info:

http://www.kuri.sakura.ne.jp/~monster/

Prequisite: Certain Special may only be used by monsters of certains breed or specific natures
Trigger: The Special has a random chance of occuring if this condition is met.
Good Effects: Self explanatory
Bad Effects: Ditto
# of uses: This is the number of times the Special may be triggered in a fight.

NamePrerequisiteTrigger Good Effects Bad Effects # of uses
PowerGood NatureMonster hit when under 50% LIF(?) Damage +100%(None) more than once per battle*
AngerBad Nature Monster hit with Withering attackWithering +100%
Guts Regen +50%		Evasion -50% Unlimited
Grit(none)Monster is KO'edRecover from KO with 1 LIF(none)Once per battle
Will(none)Monster uses move while at 99 GutsAccuracy +100%Guts Used +50%Unlimited
Fight(none)Opponent's Guts reaches 99Monster gains Guts equal to damage taken if attacked(none)Unlimited
Fury(none)Monster is attacked while moving Damage +100%
Withering +100%		(none)Unlimited
Guard(none)Monster is hit 3 times in succession Damage Taken -30%
Guts Regen +50%		Damage -50%Unlimited
Ease(none)Dodge or Succeed with an attack 5 times in successionEvasion +100%
Guts Costs -30%		Damage Received +100% Unlimited
Hurry(none)Fewer than 10 seconds remaining on timer Critical Hit rate + 100%(none)Lasts until end of battle
RealJokers and Joker sub-breeds onlyOpponent's LIF is less than 25% of maximumWithering +50%
Critical Rate +50%
Guts Regen +50
Damage Taken -30%
Guts Damage Taken -30%
Arena Movement Speed increased		Reverse of benefits apply if REAL wears offUntil end of battle
Vigor(none)Monster succeeds with attack with less than 5 seconds elapsed on timerArena Movement Speed increase(none)Unlimited
UnityColor Pandora breeds onlyMonster fails with an attack 5 times in succession or if hit 5 times in successionincrease arena move speedlowers guts regen Unlimited


Disclaimer: The info posted in the above chart may not be 100% accurate. It will be updated if new info is uncovered.

* Japanese site says only once per battle, but numerous users on MRM have seen it twice in one battle.
* ColorPandora info thanks to Bill Fbgame.

By Monster Fenrick on Tuesday, July 31, 2001 - 05:11 am:

By mepersoner on Tuesday, July 31, 2001 - 11:58 am:

Poison is supposed to be the equivilant of the pixie/joker only in sub-breed form. Yep seen power more than once. Everything else looks right.

By Dark Phoenix on Tuesday, July 31, 2001 - 05:38 pm:

I can't remember all of the quotes verbatim but here goes:

POWER - "You won't see it's true abilities until it's cornered"

ANGER - "It becomes easily enraged"

GRIT - "Giving up is not in its nature"

WILL - "Its senses are very keen."

FIGHT - "It is very passionate."

FURY - "It goes completely out of control when it's angered"

GUARD - "It knows how the endure hardships."

EASE - "It appears confident."

HURRY - "It doesn't give up until the last moment."

REAL - "It tends to hide it's true abilities."

VIGOR - "It tends to become elated."

UNITY - "They are three but have one mind."

By hengers rock on Tuesday, September 25, 2001 - 10:39 pm:

we have fought an end bringer against a skeleton, the skeleton has slower guts. with the same stat gains as a henger/joker, but slower guts leads me to belive that skeleton is really a garlant (henger/dragon) that just has Real.
